The program include collaboration health plan , partner medical group , community organization . Program activity include : 1 ) telephonic-structured assessment informal caregiver conduct SCAN Memory Program care manager ; 2 ) problem identification result assessment ; 3 ) pre-established protocol procedure problem resolution . ACCESS , prototype SCAN Memory Program , develop test San Diego County successful help affected patient caregiver .
